timeline.message: updated name of deny encryption scope override and changed encryption scope object

timeline.bodyText: this follows Cpk, though it feels weird but we need it for the specialized blob builder

timeline.bodyText: Should the parameter be renamed to cpkScopeInfo or something along those lines.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText: This should be in the public API as this is taking as a parameter in public API methods.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText: Do we want to change {@link String encryption_scope} to {@code encryptionScope}? Right now this is going to create a link called encryption_scope that links to String.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
